name: recent-files
title: Recent Files
description: Show recent files from a specified directory
author: whatasoda

commands.name: index
commands.title: Show Recent Files
commands.subtitle: List recent files from target directories
commands.description: Shows the most recently created files from specified directories

commands.name: preferences
commands.title: Open Extension Preferences
commands.subtitle: Configure target directories
commands.description: Open preferences to configure which directories to scan

preferences.name: targetDirectories
preferences.title: Target Directories
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of directories to scan for recent files (e.g., ~/Downloads, ~/Desktop, ~/Documents)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
